Ecology & Sustainability Initiatives

By Aikya Seva Centre

At Aikya Seva Centre, our commitment to ecological well-being goes hand-in-hand with empowering rural communities. We’ve introduced sustainable solutions like tree plantation drives, clean energy biogas units, and slurry composting systems that transform waste into productivity.

1. Tree Plantation Drives

Our community-led plantations aim to improve biodiversity, reduce carbon footprint, and create a greener tomorrow. We actively involve schools, local volunteers, and even the police department in this effort.

Local police taking part in Aikya's plantation drive

2. Biogas Energy for Rural Households

We’ve installed biogas plants that convert organic waste into clean-burning fuel, reducing reliance on firewood and improving indoor air quality.

Biogas plant producing clean fuel from biodegradable waste

3. Slurry Processing Unit

After energy extraction from biogas, the leftover slurry is processed into nutrient-rich compost. This unit helps farmers improve soil fertility without chemical fertilizers.

Slurry composting unit for sustainable organic farming

Impact Highlights

  • 5000+ trees planted since 2024
  • Biogas introduced in multiple households
  • Soil productivity improved through organic slurry compost
  • Increased environmental awareness among communities

Our sustainability journey is driven by nature, powered by community, and aimed at building a future that thrives with balance and biodiversity.
